TopicTitle: Rover Adventures - Circumnavigatin Kerbin on a Rover.

Articles.Content:
This is my personal challenge to circumnavigate Kerbin on a rover, no mods, only stock because HARDCORE. ItÃ‚Â´s a daunting task, I know, but I think it can be done, IÃ‚Â´m taking my time and having a blast.

The general profile of this series:

- No Mods, no hacks, no hyperedit, only stock.

- This is a permadeath series, what crashes crashes and stays like that.

- If a rover crashes or there are casualties, a new rover is delivered by air from the Kerbal Space Center to the precise location of the last crash.

- The journey must be made on a rover with the wheels on the ground, no "hopping" over terrain obstacles to deliver a new rover a few kilometers ahead.

- The only exception to the previous rule: If a body of water cuts the path and thereÃ‚Â´s no way around, then the rover must be taken from the ground, transported over the gap and delivered on the other side.

*** RIGHT NOW ***

Out of the South Pole and into the Antarctic thundra throug the mountains wearing a weird hat, closing the distance to my final destination: The Kerbal Space Center Flagpole.

You can follow these events on youtube, this is the latest uploaded video

Edited June 8, 2014 by Wooks
You can follow the unfolding events on youtube, this is the latest uploaded video
